original_title: Words and Music by Jerry Herman
overview: WORDS AND MUSIC is the story of one of Broadway's iconic figures: the composer/lyricist of Hello, Dolly!, Mame and La Cage aux Folles. Jerry Herman and an all-star cast, chart his rise from 1950s off-Broadway through all of his smash hits. Featuring never-before-seen footage of original stage performances, and a score full of classic show tunes.
tagline: The life and career of legendary Broadway composer/lyricist Jerry Herman
title: Words and Music by Jerry Herman
